name: tagMenu
description: Sometimes when the size of tag file is large, and you are searching for a   particular tag, it is cumbersome to ^N through the list of tags. This plugin is aimed to solve this. A hidden menu containing the list of tags is  created. This can be accessed using CTRL-K, or any other mapping that you  want
install_details:
1. Copy the tagsMenu.vim script to $HOME/.vim/plugin directory. Refer to':help add-plugin', ':help add-global-plugin', and ':help runtimepath' for more details.                                                              
2. Restart Vim                                                             
3. Use ":Tags" command to create the menu of tags.
